Detailed Description

Defintion of PortalRPC import structure.

Imports are representing client-side view to remote target.

Definition at line 163 of file lustre_import.h.

Field Documentation

struct list_head obd_import::imp_committed_list [read]

List of requests that are retained for committed open replay.

Once open is committed, open replay request will be moved from the imp_replay_list into the imp_committed_list. The imp_replay_cursor is for accelerating searching during replay.

Definition at line 195 of file lustre_import.h.

Referenced by ptlrpc_free_committed().

Definition at line 165 of file lustre_import.h.

int obd_import::imp_last_generation_checked
See also:
ptlrpc_free_committed remembers imp_generation value here after a check to save on unnecessary replay list iterations

Definition at line 244 of file lustre_import.h.

Referenced by ptlrpc_free_committed().

__u64 obd_import::imp_last_success_conn

When we last successfully connected.

time in 64bit jiffies

Definition at line 264 of file lustre_import.h.

__u64 obd_import::imp_last_transno_checked
See also:
ptlrpc_free_committed remembers last_transno since its last check here and if last_transno did not change since last run of ptlrpc_free_committed and import generation is the same, we can skip looking for requests to remove from replay list as optimisation

Definition at line 255 of file lustre_import.h.

Referenced by ptlrpc_free_committed().

struct lustre_handle obd_import::imp_remote_handle [read]

Remote export handle.

This is how remote side knows what export we are talking to. Filled from response to connect request
